survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how freelancers manage their finances, including budgeting, saving, and challenges faced.

questions.question_text: How often do you track your income and expenses?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you track your income and expenses?

questions.question_text: Which of the following financial tools do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following financial tools do you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your biggest challenge when managing freelance finances?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Limit response length to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What is your biggest challenge when managing freelance finances?

questions.question_text: Do you set aside money for taxes regularly?
answer_options: No, I don't know how much to set aside
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure clarity in options.

script.question_text: Do you set aside money for taxes regularly?
answer_options: No, I don't know how much to set aside

questions.question_text: How do you handle irregular income? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: I maintain a strict budget regardless of income fluctuations
I adjust my spending based on current income
I rely on savings during low-income periods
I have a side hustle for stability
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Add a text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: How do you handle irregular income? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: I maintain a strict budget regardless of income fluctuations
I adjust my spending based on current income
I rely on savings during low-income periods
I have a side hustle for stability

questions.question_text: What percentage of your income do you save each month?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Options should cover common ranges.

script.question_text: What percentage of your income do you save each month?

questions.question_text: Have you ever faced financial emergencies as a freelancer?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Keep options simple.

script.question_text: Have you ever faced financial emergencies as a freelancer?

questions.question_text: If you faced a financial emergency, how did you handle it?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Yes, multiple times' or 'Yes, once or twice' to Q7
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question for detailed responses. Limit to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Show only if Q7 response is 'Yes'.

script.question_text: If you faced a financial emergency, how did you handle it?

questions.question_text: Do you have a separate bank account for freelance income?
